thread.title: 'If That Happens…': Everyone Is Buzzing About the Bomb Ted Cruz Just Dropped at CPAC
thread.title_full: 'If That Happens…': Everyone Is Buzzing About the Bomb Ted Cruz Just Dropped at CPAC

author: parkec
title: 'If That Happens…': Everyone Is Buzzing About the Bomb Ted Cruz Just Dropped at CPAC
text:
'If That Happens…': Everyone Is Buzzing About the Bomb Ted Cruz Just Dropped at CPAC   Facebook 0 Twitter 0 livefyre 0 Email Print 
By Kevin Daley | Daily Caller 
Texas Sen. Ted Cruz anticipates another vacancy on the U.S. Supreme Court will arise in a matter of months. 
“I think we’ll have another Supreme Court vacancy this summer,” Cruz said at the Conservative Political Action Conference Thursday. “If that happens, as much as the left is crazy now, they will go full Armageddon meltdown because the next vacancy is where we’ll have the ability to act and restore basic constitution protections.”
